name: Element of Surprise
description:
Made in four days during the Finnish College Jam #2.

Credits to team Dynamic Duo.

Coding and Design: Olli Juhola

Music and Design: Jani Gröhn

Instructions:

- WASD to move

- Space to jump

- Shift to sprint

- Left click to cast quick spell

- Right click to cast strong spell

Casting spells costs elemental essences

Your staff randomly changes between the elements

Collect more elemental essences from the ground and fallen enemies
